data.oai_dc:dc: R scripts for Sheth & Angert PNAS 2018

R scripts to reproduce all analyses in Sheth & Angert (2018). Run scripts in order from "01_" to "12_". Scripts in "temporal_demog_compensation_TableS7_FigS7" folder were used to run analyses of temporal demographic compensation for populations from the southern range edge (see SI Appendix for more details).
integral projection model|latitudinal gradient|life table response experiment|range limit|vital rate
